name: IBANCheckDigit_isValidTest
description: Unit tests for the IBANCheckDigit isValid method.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_NullCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a null code.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_ShortCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a short code.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_InvalidCheckDigits
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with invalid check digits.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_ValidCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid code.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_CheckDigitException
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a code that should trigger a check digit exception.
